name: Orb of Confusion
text: During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add %game.condition.muddle% to one attack.  When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Orb of Momentum
text: During your Move ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add +1 %game.action.move%. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Orb of Agility
text: During your Move ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add %game.action.jump%. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Orb of Vigor
text: During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add +1 %game.action.attack%. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Orb of Retribution
text: When attacked by an adjacent enemy, you may place one characer token on this card to gain %game.action.retaliate% 1 for the attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Orb of Infection
text: During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add %game.condition.poison% to one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Orb of Vitality
text: During your turn, you may place one characer token on this card to perform "%game.action.heal% 1, Self". When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Orb of Protection
text: When damaged by an attack, you may place one characer token on this card to gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Orb of Fortune
text: During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to gain Advantage for one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Orb of Despair
text: During your Attack ability, you may place one characer token on this card to add %game.condition.curse% to one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Pox Antidote
text: During your turn, remove INFECT $infect$ from Self or adjacent ally.

name: Trophy Helmet
text: Your attacks are unaffected by %game.action.retaliate%.

name: War Pick
text: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.pierce% 4 to one attack.

name: Chain Mace
text: During your turn, perform "%game.action.attack% 3, %game.action.range:2%".

name: Draining Greaves
text: At the end of your turn, if you moved four or more hexes during your turn, one adjacent enemy suffers one damage.

name: Shoes of Phasing
text: During your Move abilities, you may move through enemies.

name: Lightweight Boots
text: During your Move ability, add +2 %game.action.move% and %game.action.jump%.

name: Bottled Moonlight
text: During your Heal ability, add +2 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.strengthen% to each heal.

name: Boots of Perpetuity
text: You are immune to %game.condition.immobilize%. At the end of your turn, if you moved zeo hexes on your turn, perform "%game.action.move% 1"

name: Curious Pendant
text: During your turn, Recover %game.card.recover% one lost card played this round.

name: Infrared Goggles
text: Gain Advantage on all attacks you perform while %game.condition.invisible%.

name: Steel Helmet
text: When attacked, consider any %game.attackmodifier.plus1% modifier card the enemy draws to be a %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

name: Woven Plate Armor
text: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and you gain %game.action.shield% 2 for the attack.

name: Mantle of Purity
text: When you would gain one or more negative conditions, prevent the conditions.

name: Boneclad Shawl
text: On the next two attacks targeting you peformed by adjacent enemies, gain %game.action.retaliate% 2 for the attack.

name: Silhouette Cuirass
text: When your hit point would be reduced to 0 by an attack targeting you, instead suffer no damage and gain %game.condition.invisible%.

name: Translocation Device
text: During your turn, swap positions with one enemy within %game.action.range:5%.

name: Alchemy Potion
text: During your turn, replace one adjacent obstacle tile with a money token.

name: Intoxicating Potion
text: During your turn, perform "%game.action.heal% 5, %game.condition.poison%, Self".

name: Iron Snare
text: During your turn, create one %game.condition.immobilize% trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%.

name: Concussion Mine
text: During your turn, create one %game.condition.stun% trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%.

name: Shifting Compass
text: During your turn, force an enemy within %game.action.range:5% to perform a "%game.action.move% 2, %game.action.jump%" ability with you controlling the ability.

name: Battering Ram
text: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.muddle% and %game.action.push% 2 to all your attacks.

name: Staff of Retribution
text: When attacked, gain %game.action.retaliate% 1, %game.action.range:3% for the attack.

name: Curseblood Blade
text: During your melee Attack ability, suffer 1 damage to add %game.condition.curse% to all your attacks.

name: Drakescale Shield
text: When attacked by an adjacent enemy, gain %game.action.retaliate% 3 for the attack.

name: Drakescale Dagger
text: During your melee Attack ability, do not draw an attack modifier card for one attack.

name: Hook Gun
text: During your turn, perform "%game.action.attack% 2, %game.action.range:3%, %game.condition.pierce% 2".

name: Resplendent Mitre
text: During your Heal action, add +2 %game.action.heal% to each Heal.

name: Canister Projectile
text: During your ranged Attack ability, add %game.condition.pierce% 2 to one attack.

name: Summoner's Whistle
text: During your turn, one summoned ally you own performs %game.action.move% +0 %game.action.attack% +0 with you controlling the abilities.

name: Booster Shot
text: During your turn, perform one of the following: Recover %game.card.recover% one discarded card | %game.action.heal% 3, Self | Add +2 %game.action.attack% to your next attack this turn.

name: Flaming Axe
text: During your melee Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.wound% to all your attacks.

name: Vipertooth Dagger
text: Gain Advantage on all your melee attacks while you are occupying difficult terrain.

name: Ghost Viper Venom
text: During your Attack ability, add %game.condition.poison% 2 to one attack.

name: Dizzying Tincture
text: During you Attack ability, add %game.condition.disarm% to one attack.

name: Drake's Blood
text: During your turn, remove all positive conditions from all enemies within %game.action.range:2%.  This can be used on enemies that have %game.condition.invisible%.

name: Mana Medicine
text: During your turn, perform "%game.action.heal% 5, Self"

name: Ashsteel Gauntlets
text: You are immune to %game.condition.disarm%, even if this item is spent. During your turn gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round. ^eot^

name: Smog Emitter
text: At the end of your turn, all enemies consider all empty hexes within %game.action.range:2% of you to be difficult terrain for the round. ^eot^

name: Lucky Horseshoe
text: When you are damage by an attack targeting you, suffer half (rounded down) the damage instead.

name: Mild Kindled Tonic
text: When an ally targets you with a Heal ability, remove one negative condition from yourself before the Heal and gain %game.condition.strengthen%.

name: Rescue Axe
text: During your melee Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack targeting an enemy adjacent to one of your allies.

name: Iron Malleus
text: During your melee Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.immobilize% to all your attacks.

name: Pike Hook
text: During your single-target melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.pierce% 2 and %game.action.pull% 1 to the attack and you may target one enemy within 2 hexes.

name: Explosive Tonic
text: During your turn, perform: %game.condition.wound% %game.action.range:3% *cone_1_1*

name: Spicy Kindled Tonic
text: On the next three Heal abilities targeting you, you may either first remove all negative conditions from yourself or gain %game.condition.strengthen%.

name: Utility Rope
text: During your turn, perform "%game.action.pull% 2, Target one ally or enemy within %game.action.range:3%."

name: Fireproof Helm
text: Whenever you would suffer damage from %game.condition.wound% instead perform "%game.action.heal% 1, Self"

name: Wooden Ladder
text: Add +1 %game.action.range% to all your ranged abilities peformed while adjacent to an obstacle. Whenever you enter a hex with a trap, you may choose not to spring the trap.

name: Medical Kit
text: Whenever you use the default top action of an ability card, you may perform a "%game.action.heal% 2, %game.action.range:1%" ability instead of an "%game.action.attack% 2" ability.

name: Mild Bolstering Tonic
text: During your Heal ability targeting at least one ally, add +1 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.strengthen% to each Heal.

name: Medallion of the Oak
text: When attacked this round, you and all adjacent allies consider any negative and %game.attackmodifier.null% attack modifiers drawn to be %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

name: Cauterizing Knife
text: During your Heal ability, add +3 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.wound% to each Heal.

name: Trauma Kit
text: During your Heal ability, double the value of each Heal. If this Heal ability removes %game.condition.wound%, this item is spent %game.card.spent% instead of consumed.

name: Scroll of Charisma
text: During your turn, one ally within %game.action.range:2% may perform one of the following: %game.action.attack% 2| %game.action.move% 2| %game.action.heal% 2, Self.

name: Rescue Shield
text: When an adjacent ally is damage by an attack targeting them, that ally gains %game.action.shield% 2 for the attack and removes all negative conditions applied by the attack.

name: Scroll of Protection
text: When an ally within %game.action.range:5% would be damaged by an attack targeting them, they suffer no damage instead.

name: Spicy Bolstering Tonic
text: During your Heal ability targeting at least one ally add +2 %game.action.heal% %game.condition.strengthen% and BLESS $bless$ to each Heal.

name: Scroll of Command
text: During you turn one ally within %game.action.range:3% may perform one of the following: %game.action.attack% 3 | %game.action.move% 3 | %game.action.heal% 3, Self.

name: Sphere of Currents
text: During your turn, create two water difficult terrain tiles in hexes within %game.action.range:3% that contain no overlay tiles. %game.condition.muddle% all figures within %game.action.range:3% occupying a water tile.

name: Slug Crossbow
text: During your single-target ranged Attack ability, turn the attack into the following: *line_1_1*.

name: Refined Slug Crossbow
text: During your single-targetranged Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and turn the attack into the following: *line_1_1*.

name: Bulwark Banner
text: During your turn, you and all allies gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round. ^eot^

name: Refined Bulwark Banner
text: During your turn, all adjacent allies gain %game.action.shield% equal to your current Shield value from abilities for the round. ^eot^

name: Remote Beetle
text: During your turn, open one unlocked closed door within %game.action.range:2%.

name: Refined Remote Beetle
text: During your turn, open one unlocked closed door within %game.action.range:2%.

name: Blazing Boots
text: During your Move ability, double the value of the movement.

name: Refined Blazing Boots
text: During your Move ability, add %game.action.jump% and double the value of the movement.

name: Viper Blowgun
text: During your turn, you may %game.element.consume.earth% to perform "%game.action.attack% 1, %game.action.range:3%, %game.condition.poison%".

name: Refined Viper Blowgun
text: During your turn, perform "%game.action.attack% 1, %game.action.range:4%, %game.condition.poison%". You may %game.element.consume.earth% to ADD TARGET $target$.

name: Frost Stone
text: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.ice%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Storm Stone
text: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.air%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Inferno Stone
text: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.fire%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Tremor Stone
text: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.earth%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Brilliant Stone
text: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.light%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Dark Stone
text: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.dark%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Wonder Stone
text: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.wild%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

name: Rockspine Bulwark
text: On the next three sources of damage from attacks targeting you or an adjacent ally, the attacked figure gains %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack.

name: Ghostshimmer Honey
text: During your turn, perform %game.action.heal% 3 REGENERATE $regenerate$ Affect self and one adjacent ally.

name: Power Modulator
text: (X is 1, 2, 3) During your turn, forgo your top action to perform %game.action.attack% X + 1 %game.action.range:2% %game.action.target% 4 - X.

name: Steam Piston Hammer
text: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.muddle% and %game.action.push% 1 to a single attack.

name: Spider Climb Gloves
text: Your movement may enter and end in hexes containing obstacles as if you had %game.action.fly%.

name: Gravity Inversion Pads
text: Crate one trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%. If you or an ally trigger this trap, that figure gains %game.action.fly% for the round. | Any enemy that enters a hex with this trap triggers it and loses %game.action.fly% for the round.

name: Delicate Model
text: You %game.action.loot% each hex this summon enters. You control this summon's actions.

name: Serrated Edge
text: During your melee attack ability, add RUPTURE $rupture$ to one attack.

name: Grisly Boots
text: After your move ability, perform %game.action.push% 1 Target one adjacent enemy. Add +1 %game.action.push% if you have move 4 or more hexes this round.

name: Terrorscale Saber
text: During your melee attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.pierce% 2 to one attack targeting an enemy with %game.condition.wound% or RUPTURE $rupture$.

name: Terrorscale Crossblades
text: On your next three melee attacks targeting enemies with at least one negative condition, gain Advantage.

name: Savage Cuirass
text: The next two times you would lose a card from your hand to negate suffering damage, discard it instead and gain %game.condition.wound%.
